mapper.select: SELECT a.infoSex,a.infoTel,a.infoImg,c.cName,b.pIdnum,b.pBirthplace,b.pAddress,b.pCno,a.infoName,a.infoAge,b.pInfo1,b.pInfo2,b.pInfo3,b.pInfo4 FROM tuserinfo a LEFT JOIN tparent b ON a.infoUser=b.pUser LEFT JOIN tcommunity c ON b.pCnum=c.cNum WHERE a.infoUser=#{username};

SELECT b.infoName,b.infoSex,b.infoTel,b.infoAge,a.pNationality,b.infoMarriage,b.infoNation, a.pBirthplace,a.pAddress,a.pIdnum,c.cName,a.pCnum,a.pCno,a.pBlood,a.pEducational,a.pInfo1,a.pInfo2,a.pInfo3,a.pInfo4 FROM tparent a INNER JOIN tuserinfo b on a.pUser=b.infoUser INNER JOIN tcommunity c ON a.pCnum =c.cNum WHERE a.pUser=#{username};
